extension.name: Carousel Module
extension.author: Brad Traversy

extension.description: Place a Bootstrap 3 carousel slider in a module position

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: tag on a css class to the module wrap

field.name: slide1_background_image
field.label: Slide 1 Background Image
field.description: This image should be at least the width of the module

field.label: Slide 1 Main Image

field.name: slide1_show_read_more
field.label: Slide 1 Show Readmore
